t: Bugle Boy - Wikipedia
s: March 22, 2025 - Bugle Boy Industries, Inc. was a clothing company founded by Vincent Nesi and William Mow in 1977. It is best known for its namesake brand of denim jeans that were popular in the 1980s. The company declared bankruptcy in 2001. Mr. Nesi was in charge of all operations, production, and design.
